summary.body: Are people in favour of having compost bins discretely dotted around the Barbican for us to put our green waste into? The resulting compost could then be used on the gardens. Having composters would reduce the amount of rubbish we are generating and would solve the paper v. plastic bin bag discussion - the paper bags won't get soggy because the rotting veg will be in your compost bin.
summary.subject: Compost in the Barbican
